messages.title: EU LEADERS AGREE ON TOUGH STANCE AT SPECIAL BREXIT SUMMIT
messages.content: Your vote counts. It will count to strengthen Theresa May’s hand and the UK’s negotiating position on Brexit. Your vote helps her secure the best deal to strengthen your economy, and helps us get on with the job of making your life in the United Kingdom better.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Strengthen Theresa May’s hand and the UK's negotiating position on Brexit to secure the best deal and strengthen the economy.

issues.brexitEurope: Strengthen Theresa May’s hand and the UK's negotiating position on Brexit.
issues.economy: Securing the best deal to strengthen your economy.

quotes.text: EU leaders agree on tough stance at special Brexit summit
